description: M e ʻ i l   S h e m u ʼ e l   ( c o m m e n t a r y   o n   R .   A h a r o n ' s   M i v ḥ a r ;   c o m p l e t e d   b y   S i m h ̣ a h   Y i t s ḥ a ḳ   a f t e r   t h e   a u t h o r ' s   d e a t h ,   a n d   a d d e d   a   p o e m   a n d   a   p r e f a c e )
title: Meʻil Shemuʼel (commentary on R. Aharon's Mivḥar; completed by Simḥah Yitsḥaḳ after the author's death, and added a poem and a preface)
author: Shemuʼel ben Yosef, of Kale
